Column.Name: Number of Registers
Parent Structure

Label.Text: Toggle registers from the list below. The items switched on will be available for Contracts that use this register set.
If the list above is missing any registers use the Refresh button to re-sync enabled registers from the Contract Settings form.
Toggle areas from the Overview and Vendor tabs

TriggerCustomEvent.TargetRecordsFormula: DB_LOOKUPALL( ARRAY("EFormType", "RecordID"), "Contract", "[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND [Register Set RecordID] = " & [RecordID] )

Label.Text: This will push the settings above to all contract records using this register set. This will overwrite any contract specific register changes so that all records will be in line with what is specified on the register set. This could take a while if there are many contracts to update.
